action.description: The committee on PBS recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The recommendation was not adopted.  The votes were as follows: 3 Ayes: Representative(s) Iwamoto, Hashem, Souza; Ayes with reservations: none; 5 Noes: Representative(s) Belatti, Lamosao, Morikawa, Poepoe, Shimizu; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Ichiyama, Woodson.
